title: Quake 3 Arena plus Quake 3 Team Arena Add-On
description:
i know this is quite old, and yes, i know that quake is not a game but it&#039;s a benchmark. but still there are many people who like to play it, or not?

the image files were copied from the original cd&#039;s (yes, ID, i supported you)

instruction:

unrar. burn or unpack the iso files (q3 is just an .iso, team arena is a clobne cd image file)

now install quake 3 arena. don&#039;t reboot. install point release, then reboot.
the point release i added to the iso is the latest. after installing the point release the game won&#039;t ask for the cd anymore,BTW.

now install team arena.

you could use the keymakers or just use on of the serials i put to the torrent.

last word: for gamers with new cards: edit your "q3config.cfg" file which is in the
baseq3 folder.

edit the the line
seta com_maxfps "50"
to
seta com_maxfps "999"

otherwise you won&#039;t get a high framerate.
